title: Solo Leveling
description: Sung Jin-Woo,a weak E-rank hunter,rises to become an overpowering S-rank Hunter,in a game-like world

title: One Piece
description: Join Monkey D. Luffy and his diverse crew as they sail the Grand Line, seeking the legendary treasure, One Piece

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori battles curses,joins a secret jujutsu society,and confronts dark forces threatening the world

title: Haikyu
description: Hinata high school student strives to overcome his height disadvantage, aiming to become a volleyball champion

title: Attack on Taitan
description: In a world on the brink of collapse,battles unfold against giant humanoid creatures threatening humanity's survival.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Driven by vengeance after his family is slaughtered, a young boy joins demon slayers in a perilous quest.

title: Naruto
description: A Ninja, Naruto, with dreams of becoming the strongest leader of his village, faces challenges and seeks recognition.

title: Hunter X Hunter
description: A young boy named Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, a prestigious and elite adventurer with unique abilities.

title: Fullmetal Alchemis
description: Two brothers,Edward and Alphonse Elric embark on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone

title: Death Note
description: A school student discovers a magic notebook, unleashing lethal consequences as he grapples with newfound power.

title: One Punch Man
description: A hero,Saitama,seeks purpose in a world where his overwhelming strength leaves him for a true challenge.

title: My Hero Academia
description: Deku, a powerless boy, challenges destiny to become a superhero, inheriting some legendary powers

title: Steins Gate
description: A group of friends stumbles upon a device enabling communication with the past, unraveling unforeseen mysteries

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Bounty hunters traverse the cosmos in a jazz,futuristic world,facing challenges that echo in the corridors of space.

title: Spirited Away
description: In Spirited Away, Chihiro courageously navigates to spirit world,unraveling its mysteries and finding her true strength.

title: Code Geass
description: Code Geass" intricately weaves a tale of political intrigue and rebellion as Lelouch vi Britannia, gifted with powers

title: Blue Lock
description: Blue Lock brings together the best young footballers in Japan for a brutal training camp, to prepare for a national league.

title: Durarara
description: Durarara, Urban anime in Ikebukuro, Tokyo, intertwining lives amid gang conflicts and supernatural mysteries.
